Body:
status = 0
for func in [ccllib.growth_factor_vec, ccllib.growth_factor_unnorm_vec,
    ccllib.growth_rate_vec, ccllib.comoving_radial_distance_vec, ccllib.
    comoving_angular_distance_vec, ccllib.h_over_h0_vec, ccllib.
    luminosity_distance_vec, ccllib.distance_modulus_vec]:
    assert_raises(CCLError, func, COSMO, [0.0, 1.0], 1, status)
assert_raises(CCLError, ccllib.omega_x_vec, COSMO, 0, [0.0, 1.0], 1, status)
assert_raises(CCLError, ccllib.rho_x_vec, COSMO, 0, 0, [0.0, 1.0], 1, status)
assert_raises(CCLError, ccllib.scale_factor_of_chi_vec, COSMO, [0.0, 1.0], 
    1, status)
